verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's [ARGM-MNR: eagerly] [V: anticipated] [ARG1: announcement] on the Iran nuclear deal could be the flashpoint for a " long - lasting " uptick in oil prices , according to Barclays analysts .
President Donald Trump 's eagerly anticipated announcement on the Iran nuclear deal could be the flashpoint for a " long - lasting " uptick in oil prices , according to Barclays analysts .
